page.title: 05EVERCREECH LOCAL NEWS
page.content:
MALI PROJECT 1985 Mr.Pope,Mr.Ryall and Mr.Keen asked {Christian Aid}which country needed help and they came up with Mali in Africa. Evercreech plans to raise Â£2500 before Christmas 1985 to be given to build a well. The Primary School raised Â£180 by performing {Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor {Dreamcoat.
ROYAL BATH AND WEST SHOW The Royal Bath and West Show is held in the last week of May.There is always a lot of traffic coming from Bath and Frome through the back roads to Evercreech.When they come through Evercreech we have a Policeman or a Police lady to control the traffic. More then 150,000 people go to the Bath and West in the four day show each year.
